title: Monarch butterflies a lesson in sustainability, social justice (University of Illinois at Chicago)
text: ( Source : University of Illinois at Chicago ) UIC Heritage Garden interns learned how to attract and grow monarch butterflies. Summer has flown - and with it the last of UIC's home-grown monarch butterflies, on its way to Mexico . The
